description: Sun protection where you need it, breathability where you want it. The Engineered™ Long Sleeve pairs two of Kuhl's exclusive Kuhldry™ premium fabrics into one technically advanced crew neck. Super-soft and naturally odor-resistant, the Engineered™ features reliable UPF 30+ protection on exposed shoulder areas and UPF 20+ protection in breathable, open knit, core panels.
name: Kuhl Kuhl Engineered LS - Mens
